display.title: Digital Storage
display.description:
Refined Storage and Applied Energistics allow you to craft computers that can store your items and fluids en mass digitally. JEI will be very helpful for this process. AE2 has an in-game guide that can help you - configure the keybind and then hold the key while hovering over an AE2 item. If you choose AE2 over RS, you will have access to mods such as PackagedAuto. 

&2NOTE: You can pick which mod you prefer for this questline. You only need to have one item to complete the quest.&r
